snippet: Business travelers, feeling squeezed, are being urged to persuade bean counters to pay for a cabin upgrade.
abstract: Joe Sharkey On the Road column observes that business airline travelers, feeling squeezed in basic coach class, are being urged to persuade travel managers to pay for a cabin upgrade.
lead_paragraph: Business travelers, feeling squeezed, are being urged to persuade bean counters to pay for a cabin upgrade.
